name.x-prompt: Form Name? (Appending form does not need to be included)
name.description: The name of the model for creating the form

project.description: The name of the project from the angular.json

inputs.x-prompt: Controls? (comma separated list of controls e.g. firstName:t,lastName:t, see description for further guidance)
inputs.description: A common separated list for controls to be created.  A colon between determines the type of control to be created.  t = textbox, c = checkbox, dd = dropwdown, r = radio.  e.g. firstName:t,lastName:t,subscribe:c,preferences:dd
